Detailed Description

template<typename T, class TRAITS, class ALLOCATOR>
class cds::queue::MoirQueue< gc::hrc_gc, T, TRAITS, ALLOCATOR >

A variation of Michael & Scott lock-free queue (Gidenstam's GC)

Implementation of Moir et al lock-free queue based on Gidenstam's reference counting GC. The algorithm is a variation of Michael & Scott's queue algorithm. It overloads dequeue function.

Source:
  • [2000] Simon Doherty, Lindsay Groves, Victor Luchangco, Mark Moir "Formal Verification of a practical lock-free queue algorithm"
  • [2002] Maged M.Michael "Safe memory reclamation for dynamic lock-freeobjects using atomic reads and writes"
  • [2003] Maged M.Michael "Hazard Pointers: Safe memory reclamation for lock-free objects"
Template parameters:
  • T Type of data saved in queue's node
  • TRAITS Traits class, see cds::queue::traits
  • ALLOCATOR Memory allocator class
Common interface: see Queue common interface.

Member Function Documentation

template<typename T , class TRAITS , class ALLOCATOR >
bool cds::queue::MoirQueue< gc::hrc_gc, T, TRAITS, ALLOCATOR >::dequeue ( T &  dest ) [inline]

Dequeues a value to dest.

If queue is empty returns false, dest is unchanged. If queue is not empty returns true, dest contains the value dequeued

Reimplemented from cds::queue::MSQueue< gc::hrc_gc, T, TRAITS, ALLOCATOR >.
